pullRequest.title: Issue 3556/track user interactions in flow
pullRequest.bodyText:
Before the PR (what is the issue or what needed to be done)
No way to track user actions around data and stats exports
The solution
Add tracking methods for Data exports, Stats and Data view
Other notes
Due to prettier being prettier, they're formatting changes in this PR
Screenshots (if appropriate)
Reviewer Checklist

 Added an explanation about the work done
 Connected the PR and the issue on Zenhub
 Added a test plan to the issue
 Updated the copyright header (when relevant)
 Formatted the code
 Added a documentation (if relevant)
 Added some unit tests (if relevant)

commit.message: [#3556] - add event tracking for data exports
[#3556] - add tracking for data view - inspect data
[#3556] - format monitoring data table view file
